forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun casts a bright yet gentle light over the city, illuminating its charming details against a backdrop of crisp air. Temperatures hover near sixty degrees, with a slight descent anticipated as the afternoon matures into the evening. The west-southwest winds drift lightly, creating an inviting atmosphere that beckons you to step outside. As you stroll through the city, you may notice a fleeting hint of fog residing in the distance, softening the outline of the Golden Gate Bridge and wrapping itself around the more distant hills, yet the immediate landscape remains predominantly clear and vibrant.

Tonight, expect a transformation as dusk draws near, bringing with it a patchwork of clouds that will dance across the sky, wrapping the city in a soft embrace with temperatures settling near fifty. A light sweater or a light jacket will serve you well for a comfortable evening spent perhaps exploring the local eateries or enjoying a quiet walk along the Embarcadero. The serenity of San Francisco on a clear day is an invitation to embrace its hidden gems, from cozy coffee shops to artisan boutiques. Whether you choose to linger among the streets or settle in for a reflective evening, the city's charm is plentiful, encouraging leisurely moments shared with fellow wanderers.
